tasks.coverage: rm -fr coverage && deno test --allow-read --allow-write --unstable-kv --allow-env --allow-net --coverage --fail-fast -- --database=./test/it-database.sqlite3 --scan=config.yml && deno coverage --html --exclude="/test/" && open coverage/html/index.html
tasks.lint: deno lint && deno run -A npm:@biomejs/biome lint
tasks.e2e:prescan: deno run --allow-read --allow-write --unstable-kv src/main-cli.ts --prescan=config.yml && deno run --allow-read --allow-write --unstable-kv src/main-cli.ts --prescan=./test/resources/config-errors.yml --logger=batch
tasks.e2e:scan: rm ./test/e2e-debug.sqlite3 && deno run --allow-read --allow-write --unstable-kv src/main-cli.ts --scan=config.yml --debug --database=./test/e2e-debug.sqlite3 && deno run --allow-read --allow-write --unstable-kv src/main-cli.ts --scan=./test/resources/config2.yml --debug --database=./test/e2e-debug.sqlite3
